long_description: explore our exquisite handmade jewelry and discover the perfect piece by category. drop by one of our locations to explore the latest collection of one of a kind and limited editon styles made locally in charleston. as seen in coastal living magazine, skirt, charleston magazine, charleston style and design and others.
generated_description: peyton william, legally known as peyton william jewelry inc., is a jewelry company based in charleston, south carolina, with an additional store on kiawah island. the company specializes in handmade, unique, and limited edition jewelry pieces, including necklaces, earrings, rings, bracelets, and italian handbags. their collections feature a variety of natural semi-precious gemstones, sea pearls, and other nature-inspired materials, reflecting a coastal-inspired aesthetic. peyton william jewelry is known for its custom-made pieces, which are designed and crafted by andreucci design studio. the company has been featured in several publications, including coastal living magazine, skirt, charleston magazine, and charleston style and design.
